title: Kick-off
description: Craig Joubert - the referee - gets things underway

title: Penalty
description: Sexton has a pop at goal from 41m and scores

title: Penalty
description: 15m out and a fraction to the right; that is easy enough for Sexton

title: Drop Goal
description: Back it goes to Ford in the pocket 23m out and he slots it through

description: Right in front on the 22.  Easy for Sexton

title: Try
description: Murray chips over with the box-kick to Henshaw who outjumps Goode and tumbles over in the corner! What a finish!

title: Penalty
description: England win the penalty at the scrum and opt for the kick at goal

title: Penalty
description: 25m out and an easy kick for Ford
